sentences.en: At some time there would have to be a reckoning with her.
sentences.cn: 迟早非得跟她算帐不可.

sentences.en: By my reckoning we are miles from the factory.
sentences.cn: 我估计我们离开工厂有数英里.

sentences.en: By my reckoning we were seven or eight kilometres from Borj Mechaab.
sentences.cn: 据我估计我们离梅卡巴堡有七八公里远。

sentences.en: By my reckoning, this short cut will save us five miles.
sentences.cn: 据我估计, 我们走这条近道可少走五英里.

sentences.en: By my reckoning, we have 12,000 clients.
sentences.cn: 据我估计，我们有1.2万名客户。

sentences.en: In the final reckoning weakness has invariably tempted aggression.
sentences.cn: 说到底,软弱总是招引侵略.

sentences.en: Interpolation between satellite positions was initially carried out by dead - reckoning procedures.
sentences.cn: 卫星定位值间的内插最初用的是推算航行法.

sentences.en: Phelan is fit again and could come into the reckoning.
sentences.cn: 菲兰已经恢复了体力,有可能获胜.

sentences.en: Police officers on the case are reckoning to charge someone very shortly.
sentences.cn: 调查这个案子的警官正在考虑尽快起诉嫌疑人。

sentences.en: Reckoning only with Bat Div Seven types they might have been invincible.
sentences.cn: 如果需要与之周旋的单是战列舰第七分舰队那类型的军舰,那么它们可能是无敌的.

sentences.en: The day of reckoning is coming for the water company directors.
sentences.cn: 跟自来水公司的主管们算账的日子就要到来了。

sentences.en: The reckoning up of revenue and expenditure shows a small surplus.
The shoplifter's day of reckoning came when he was charged with 30 cases of theft.
sentences.cn: 那个冒充顾客进商店行窃的扒手被指控盗窃30次,他遭报应的日子来临了.

sentences.en: The waiter gave me the reckoning.
They are typical of couples who plan a family without reckoning on the small fortune it will cost.
sentences.cn: 他们是那种典型的想要孩子但不考虑花销有多大的夫妻。

sentences.en: Tomorrow is the day of reckoning; the accountant will tell me what my profits were and how much tax I'll have to pay.
sentences.cn: 明天就是算总账的日子,会计师会告诉我有多少盈利, 该交多少税.

words.tran_cn: 计算手册；计算者；清算人

phrases.tran_cn: n. 结账日；最后审判日

trans.tran_cn: 计算，账目，船只位置的推算，（尤指体育运动）属于可能胜出者行列之内
trans.tran_en: calculation that is based on a careful guess rather than on exact knowledge

trans.tran_cn: <正>计算( reckon的现在分词)，猜想，考虑，<非正>思忖
